header.description: Property. This message contains a set of parameters useful in setting up the volume (a box) in which the robot is allowed to move. This is useful only when planning for mobile parts of  the robot as well. Define the frame of reference for the box corners

min_corner.description: Property. The minumum corner of the box, with respect to the robot starting pose

max_corner.description: Property. The maximum corner of the box, with respect to the robot starting pose
